entity.name: posts
entity.query: select p.id,p.post_title,u.display_name,p.post_status,p.post_modified,p.post_name from mn_posts p inner join mn_users u ON p.post_author = u.id where post_type='post' AND post_status='publish'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select p.id,p.post_title,u.display_name,p.post_status,p.post_modified,p.post_name from mn_posts p inner join mn_users u ON p.post_author = u.id where post_type='post' AND post_status='publish' AND id='${dih.delta.id}'
